kkk.title: Software Engineer
kkk.description:
Turkish Land Forces CIS Dept. — www.kkk.tsk
10 years, 2003 — 2013

highlights.1: Worked with an agile team which followed Domain Driven Design principles to build the 'Logistics Information System' for the Turkish Army.
highlights.2: Took responsibility in all the phases of SDLC: requirements gathering, analysis, design, implementation, testing, deployment and maintenance.
highlights.3: Gave support to nearly 1000 multi-locationed users.
highlights.4: Integrated systems using XML and SOAP technologies.
highlights.5: Created REST apis for responsive user interfaces.
highlights.7: Wrote software documentation and gave user training.
